summary: App updated to a “Feedback Mode” experience with no signup: replace early-access/email capture with a single “Give Feedback” CTA that opens a Google Form in a new tab, remove all pricing mentions from header/footer, and show a simple thank-you message after form submission.
architectural_notes: Feedback collection via external Google Form opened in a new tab; no in-app signup/email capture.
UI must not display pricing anywhere (header/footer).

existing_features.title: Replace any “Join Early Access” and/or email-capture UI elements with a single “Give Feedback” call-to-action (CTA) throughout the app, keeping all other UI and features unchanged.

Update the primary “Give Feedback” CTA (currently in the main navigation) so that clicking it opens the Google Form https://forms.gle/gQA8LJEqMBNJsooL6 in a new browser tab, instead of opening an in-app feedback dialog.
After the user initiates feedback submission flow, display the thank-you message exactly: “Thanks — your feedback helps shape what we build next.”
Remove the footer line that includes “Pro (£19/month) coming soon” and remove any other pricing mentions from the footer and header so no pricing appears there.

new_feature_requests.summary: Switch app UI to “Feedback Mode” with no signup / no email capture
Replace “Join Early Access” / email capture with a single “Give Feedback” CTA
“Give Feedback” CTA opens Google Form (https://forms.gle/gQA8LJEqMBNJsooL6) in a new tab
Remove “Pro (£19/month) coming soon” and all pricing mentions from footer/header
After feedback submit, display thank-you message: “Thanks — your feedback helps shape what we build next.”

projectName: Switch UI to Feedback Mode: single Give Feedback CTA, external Google Form, and remove pricing copy
